TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NameValueFileSectionHandler extends System.Object implements class System.Configuration.IConfigurationSectionHandler

summary.span: Provides access to a configuration file.

span.span: Provides access to a configuration file.

summary.span: This type supports the .NET Framework configuration infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

span.span: This type supports the .NET Framework configuration infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O `file` atributo do `` seção especifica um caminho relativo para um arquivo externo que contém as definições de configuração de aplicativo personalizadas.The `file` attribute of the `` section specifies a relative path to an external file that contains custom application-configuration settings. Os detalhes fornecidos no arquivo de atuam como um `` seção no arquivo de configuração.The details provided in the file act as an `` section in the configuration file. O arquivo é acessado usando o classe.The file is accessed using the class. Elemento de raiz do arquivo deve corresponder à seção de referência a ele.The file's root element must match the section referring to it.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public object Create (object parent, object configContext, System.Xml.XmlNode section);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Create(object parent, object configContext, class System.Xml.XmlNode section) cil managed
Public Function Create (parent As Object, configContext As Object, section As XmlNode) As Object
public: virtual System::Object ^ Create(System::Object ^ parent, System::Object ^ configContext, System::Xml::XmlNode ^ section);
abstract member Create : obj * obj * System.Xml.XmlNode -> obj override this.Create : obj * obj * System.Xml.XmlNode -> obj

summary.span: Creates a new configuration handler and adds it to the section-handler collection based on the specified parameters.

span.span: Creates a new configuration handler and adds it to the section-handler collection based on the specified parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O `parent` parâmetro de objeto atua como as definições de configuração na seção de configuração pai correspondente.The `parent` object parameter acts as the configuration settings in the corresponding parent configuration section. O `configContext` parâmetro de objeto é o caminho virtual para o qual o manipulador de seção de configuração calcula os valores de configuração.The `configContext` object parameter is the virtual path for which the configuration section handler computes configuration values. Normalmente esse parâmetro é reservado e é `null`.Normally this parameter is reserved and is `null`. O `section` parâmetro é o que contém as informações de configuração a ser manipulado.The `section` parameter is the that contains the configuration information to be handled. O `section` parâmetro fornece acesso direto ao conteúdo XML da seção de configuração.The `section` parameter provides direct access to the XML contents of the configuration section.

exception.span: The file specified in the attribute of exists but cannot be loaded.

span.span: The file specified in the attribute of exists but cannot be loaded.

exception.span: \- or - The attribute of does not match the root element of the file specified in the attribute.

span.span: \- or - The attribute of does not match the root element of the file specified in the attribute.
